snippet: You have never seen all those words in that order ever before. Jeremy Lin, the Harvard-educated point guard for the New York Knicks of the NBA, is being praised as the Jackie Robinson of his sport. With Yao Ming retired, let the Linsanity begin.
abstract: You have never seen all those words in that order ever before. Jeremy Lin, the Harvard-educated point guard for the New York Knicks of the NBA, is being praised as the Jackie Robinson of his sport. With Yao Ming retired, let the Linsanity begin.
